content.rendered:
Reproductive health
on your fingertips:

  • Instant symptom assessment (free)
  • Consult with a gynaecologist @ ₹50/-
  • Private at-home pathology tests
  • Anonymous support chatrooms (free)
  • Period tracking (free)

Meet Our Gynaecologists

Dr. Akula Ramya Krishna

MBBS, DNB (Ob-Gyn)

View Profile
Dr. Reema Shah

MBBS, OB-GYN
Clinical Lead

View Profile
Dr. Pooja Jain

MBBS, DGO, DNB

View Profile

Trusted partner for the healthcare of

100 +
women!

Patient Testimonials

Received instant solution to my vaginal discharge problem

"The process of consultation on the app is super simple. Dr. Pooja is very sweet, she instantly solved my vaginal discharge issues. I could easily follow-up with her within the given time. I would definitely recommend the app to my friends and family."
- Shreya Raj
Sorted my urinary tract infections issues in minutes!

"Wonderful experience for online consultation with Pinky Promise. My doctor in-charge was Dr. Rusha. She was quite friendly and patient when solving my problem. I never thought that it will take just a few minutes to sort my urinary tract infection issue. Wish I had known about this service earlier. Highly recommended!"
- Meenu Goyal
Simple and easy process for birth control solutions

"At first I was very hesitant to consult a gynaecologist online. I was worried about being asked awkward questions and being judged by the gynac. But none of this happens on the Pinky Promise app! Just answered some simple questions and received my birth control solution in no time. I would definitely recommend Pinky Promise to anyone who’s looking for easy and quick reproductive health solutions!"
- Akshita Jain
Got my reproductive health issues sorted easily!

"Great experience as a first timer! Dr. Reema is excellent and love how easily she could identify my issue, explain it to me in simple words and provide the perfect treatment options that suits me. The team was also very supportive and helped me throughout the process. Do give Pinky Promise’ consultations a try and I’m sure they will not let you down!"
- Tanvi Mehta
Helped with my irregular periods

"I’ve been healthy all my life, due to which I’ve always had an issue of irregular periods and found it difficult to reach out to a doctor. Then, I came across the Pinky Promise app where it's possible to track my period symptoms and help me clear my doubts. The chatbot was smartly curated with a series of questions that I answered and instantly understood that irregular periods are normal and not a serious issue unless I’m facing any major symptoms! This app is my go-to for any issues related to my reproductive health."
- Harshita Darak, Age 19
One anonymous conversation can go a long way!

“Pinky Promise is an application that not only put me at ease regarding all my issues but also enabled me to have a very candid conversation due to its anonymous feature combined with their highly professional medical service. The entire process was very seamless and hassle-free and all in all lots more convenient compared to visiting a medical professional in person. Highly recommend!"
- Ananya Chaturvedi, Age 22
One stop solution to reproductive health problems!

"In a world full of judgmental people, it is difficult to openly talk about topics that have been considered taboo. On the Pinky Promise app, women freely speak about these topics without the fear of being judged, receive the right advice by professionals, and the app is super easy to use. Their Post Pad cream is my favourite, it smells like a bowl of fresh strawberries, the texture is non-sticky, and it absorbs quickly."
- Rutu Desai, Age 22
Relieved my menstruation anxiety

"I was so stressed about menstruating 3 times in one month & this led me to check out my symptoms on Pinky Promises free gynac-verified chatbot where I got instant clarification! I had all of my doubts cleared and I had nothing to worry about!"
- Saloni Somoshi, Age 21
Previous
Next

How it works

Step 1

Answer a few questions
about your symptoms
and medical history

Step 2

Pay Rs. 50 online and upload your ID
card to get connected instantly
with your gynecologist

Step 3

Chat with your gynaecologist, understand your diagnosis & prescription and stay connected to our support team as you go through your recovery journey

Watch this video to
learn more about the
Pinky Promise app.
